meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to prevent or relieve arthritis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antiarthritics to help with my arthritis pain.
meanings.sent2: She researched different antiarthritics to find the best one for her condition.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the antiarthritics for vitamins and almost took them together!
meanings.sent4: The antiarthritics acted like a shield, protecting my joints from further damage.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the antiarthritics made them easy to spot in the medicine cabinet.

meanings.definition: Relating to the prevention or relief of arthritis.
meanings.sent1: The antiarthritics cream provided instant relief for her swollen joints.
meanings.sent2: He followed an antiarthritics diet to reduce inflammation in his body.
meanings.sent3: The antiarthritics gloves made her hands look like they belonged to a superhero!
meanings.sent4: The antiarthritics properties of the lotion soothed her aching muscles.
meanings.sent5: The antiarthritics exercises helped improve her flexibility and mobility.
